element.name: One Piece Homebrew
element.description:
This is an Homebrew Manual

An unofficial 5e supplement for Eiichiro Oda's One Piece. Homebrew created by u/Mr-Silvers. Coded into Aurora Builder by Jollyproxi. Special thanks to: Nick "Dread Master" Vendel, Konard and mamawerecat

setters.set: u/Mr-Silvers and Eiichiro Oda; KOdechi & Jollyproxi
